title: Looking for a flexible Sub
body: TeGC is looking for a bronze/silver ranked flexible substitute that can play all roles at least to an average level

replies.body:
Put me down as a substitute, i'm a flex queue mercenary. Select autofill every game so end up in the bot lane 90% of the time.

Best two champs in each role (6.23):

Top: Kayle, Malphite
Jungle: Malphite, Morgana
Middle: Kayle, Morgana
Marksman: Ashe, Caitlyn
Support: Janna, Nami

Best champs in each role:

Top: Darius, Renekton, Irelia
JG: Lee Sin, Trundle
MID: Orianna, Ahri, Zed
ADC: Jhin, Lucian, Caitlyn
SUP: Thresh, Bard, Morgana 

hmu in league if you guys are interested, flexible to play other champs too
add me H3LLRAZ3R i can play all roles decent but prefer adc or mid
ive just got to S2 in ranked flex mostly by solo.

support i prefer ali / leona / blitz 
 adc  i prefer vayne / jinx / jhin / draven
 mid i prefer veiger / malzahar / swain
jungle i prefer amumu / fiddle / ww 
top i prefer garen / nasus / darius  
now this all depends on who im vs and on there team i try to pick someone whos going to make a difference in team fights
Hey, im interested in joining, i can play all roles and most champs, have a mic and am available all arvos, i added you in game panga222
